statusLine.command: input=$(cat); session_start=$(stat -f %B ~/.claude 2>/dev/null || date +%s); current_time=$(date +%s); duration=$((current_time - session_start)); hours=$((duration / 3600)); minutes=$(((duration % 3600) / 60)); if [ $hours -gt 0 ]; then time_str="${hours}h ${minutes}m"; else time_str="${minutes}m"; fi; printf "\033[2m[%s]\033[22m %s \033[2m[%s]\033[22m" "$time_str" "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | sed "s|$HOME|~|")" "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')"
